column4: anyone for a procmail / spamassassin question (local .procmailrc not executed) ?
that's a MTA config issue, not a SA one
then ~/.procmailrc will be run by default
watch your postfix logs to see what is happening
you specifically configured postfix to use a global one?
thanks for your time, I'll start looking at the postfix config, maybe there is something in there
see what is in the initrd image, I think  it has remnants of an old md array
it's a gzip'd ext2 filesystem in hoary, and a cpio archive on breezy, iirc
i tried gzip, cpio just hangs, file says "inux Compressed ROM File System data"
i tried compress and bzip2 as well
